name: Idle White House
description:
Welcome to the most exciting tycoon game! Now you have become the president of the USA!
Hire Agents!
Make Investments
Make More Popularity
Expand your business and become the best president in History!

Features:
- Casual and easy gameplay
- Various facilities upgrades and income boosters
- Amazing animations and 3D graphics!


- Make important managing decisions to expand your business
- Earn Money even offline.
- No internet connection needed

If you like idle and tycoon games, you will enjoy this one. Idle White house is an easy-to-play game where you run your own business. Make important management decisions to build your own financial empire!
